scripts.dev: run-p dev:main dev:numbers dev:connect dev:like dev:notifications
scripts.dev-s: run-s dev:main dev:numbers dev:connect dev:like dev:notifications
scripts.dev:connect: cross-env SVELTE_APP=connect vite build --mode dev --config apps.vite.config.js
scripts.dev:like: cross-env SVELTE_APP=like vite build --mode dev --config apps.vite.config.js
scripts.dev:notifications: cross-env SVELTE_APP=notifications vite build --mode dev --config apps.vite.config.js
scripts.dev:numbers: cross-env SVELTE_APP=numbers vite build --mode dev --config apps.vite.config.js
scripts.dev:subscription-form: cross-env SVELTE_APP=subscription-form vite build --mode dev --config apps.vite.config.js
scripts.build: run-p build:main build:numbers build:connect build:like build:notifications
scripts.build-s: run-s build:main build:numbers build:connect build:like build:notifications
scripts.build:connect: cross-env SVELTE_APP=connect vite build --mode prod --config apps.vite.config.js
scripts.build:like: cross-env SVELTE_APP=like vite build --mode prod --config apps.vite.config.js
scripts.build:notifications: cross-env SVELTE_APP=notifications vite build --mode prod --config apps.vite.config.js
scripts.build:numbers: cross-env SVELTE_APP=numbers vite build --mode prod --config apps.vite.config.js
scripts.build:subscription-form: cross-env SVELTE_APP=subscription-form vite build --mode prod --config apps.vite.config.js
